translations.translation: what you are promised is certainly true -
Verily the promise made to you is true:
surely what you are being warned against is true,
that what you are promised is certainly true
Undoubtedly, the promise you are given is surely true.
Verily, that which you are promised is surely true.
What you are threatened with is most surely true,
surely that you are promised is true,
Lo! that wherewith ye are threatened is indeed true,
What you are promised is certainly true:
Verily that wherewith ye are threatened is surely true.
indeed what you are promised is true,
Verily that which ye are promised is true;
Verily, that which you are promised (i.e. Resurrection in the Hereafter and receiving the reward or punishment of good or bad deeds, etc.) is surely true.
indeed, that which you are promised is true,
What you are promised is true.
Indeed, what you are promised is true.
[51:5] assuredly what you are promised (mā, ‘what’, relates to the verbal action), in other words, the promise given to them of resurrection and other matters, is true, is indeed a true promise,
(Lo! that wherewith ye are threatened) regarding the resurrection (is indeed true) will indeed take place,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ } أنتم أيها المكلفون، المجبولون على فطرة التوحيد والعرفان من البعث والحشر والحساب والجزاء، وغير ذلك من المعتقدات الأخروية، المترتبة على العالم المحيط الإلهي، وقدرته الغالبة وإرادته الشاملة { لَصَادِقٌ } [الذاريات: 5] ثابت محقق وقوعه بلا شك وشبهة
